ygData.subject: Re: Bellow & just a comment in response to Bob Stewart's
ygData.msgSnippet: Bellow starts at 7 dmg at level 12 and gets an extra tick of damage every 2 levels, just like Hymn starts at 6 and gets 2 more every 6 levels. The consistent 5
ygData.messageBody:
Bellow starts at 7 dmg at level 12 and gets an extra tick of damage every 2
levels, just like Hymn starts at 6 and gets 2 more every 6 levels. The
consistent 5 dmg you were experiencing might have been due to resists.

Good Journey,

Sineras Silverlyre (Cazic-Thule)


8)-----Original Message-----

8)Nah, I'm playing a woodelf as well. It usually does 7pts for
8)me. Maybe it
8)was tweaked since you first got it. BTW, I love wood elves
8)too much to play
8)any other race unless forced to (my next chrt is an
8)enchanter, and I don't
8)think wood elf is an option). I just love having forage &
8)hide at lvl 1. :)

8)----- Original Message -----
8)From: John Kim <kim@...>

8)> And Bellow goes up a point in damage every other level or so.

8)> points max when I got it. Maybe wood elves have smaller
8)> lungs?
